_header: Saint Jerome says that signs fifteen
_description: The Fifteen Signs of Doomsday in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — forty-seven couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Ierom sais þat signes fifteneSal bifore þe day of dome be sene…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And here a tale now wil I telleAcordand to þis same godspelle
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De xv signis ante diem iudicii (rubric, f. 4ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.162-164.

EDCPCM.First Lines:
Þan sal crist de[ ]all king ful wisAnd ger þe sinful sare
                    grise…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Of ataking þat I haf herd telleÞat falles wel til
                    our gosspelle
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Unde uersus de eiusdem signis (followed by Latin verses, then these
                    verses, f. 19va) with accompanying Latin text
EDCPCM.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.
